_example.category: this is used to sort the commands in the help post;  if not specified, the command will not be listed
_example.function: the name of the function to call;  defaults to sendResponse if not specified.  All functions pass in the message, command and additional text as arguments.
_example.needsArgs: if this field is defined at all, the command will fail if arguments aren't specified
_example.info: the text displayed when someone inputs /knux help [this command];  if this isn't specified, the bot will deny its existence
_example.auth: if this field is defined at all, only owner, server mods, and whitelisted users can use the command;  specify a group name defined in config.json's authIds to whitelist those members
_example.cooldown: cooldown before a given command can be reused by the same person
_example.regex: if this attribute is defined, the command can be initiated whenever a match is detected in other users' posts (generally don't use this with Minnie, okay?)

all: sendResponse will just choose one of these randomly and post it
other functions can make use of these as well.
all is the default category, other category names can be defined.

help.info: How may this lovely lady be of assistance?

info.info: How may this lovely lady be of assistance?

cmd.info: How may this lovely lady be of assistance?

command.info: How may this lovely lady be of assistance

all: Everybody give it up for the marvelous Minnie!  Thank you, thank you, you're too kind!
Minnie in the house, ready to work her magic!
Minnie's here, now this party can really get started!
Get ready for a show the likes of which this world's never seen!  Minnie's BACK, baby!
In this world, it's dazzle or _bedazzle!_
owo what's this?  Starting the show without the main attraction?
Expecting someone else?  Too bad, MINNIE TIME!
It's been fun, but for now I must bid you all adieu!
Oh, look at the time! Toodles!
That's all the time we have tonight, thanks for being such a wonderful audience!
Now you see me, _now you don't!_
Sorry, sweetie, that's act's not in this girl's bag 'o tricks!
I'm a magician, not a miracle worker!
Erm, the only person I know who could do that is currently behind bars.
Look, I can do some pretty astounding stuff, but _that_. That right there. That's impossible.
Could you speak up?  I'm not sure I got that.
That didn't sound right... could you repeat your request?
No can do, darlin'!  This show's for all audiences~
Sorry, I just can't do that.  Not legally.
Preeeeetty sure what you're asking for is a breach of the magician's code...
My magic 8-ball says that would be a bad idea, so I think I'll pass!
I consulted the spirits and they advised against that.  Heavily.
Ohh, I would but, uh... I need my assistant for that!
I may use my magnificent powers for everyone's amazement, but they aren't toys!
Oh-ho-ho, nice try you cheeky devil~
Hah, yeah, I'm pretty great, aren't I?
Thank you, I'll be here all week!
I'm the marvelous Minnie Marigold, magician extraordinaire!  If you need my assistance, just type /minnie help and I'll show you what I can do!
Word of advice: don't pick a fight with a magician.
No need to get aggressive, now!
Oh please, you'll have to do better than that!
Oh goodness, however shall I recover from such a _scathing_ comment!?
Honey, I work in showbiz.  You're not the first to try that line.
Uhhhhh. This. Isn't that kind of show.
No can do, darlin'!  This show's for all audiences~
Preeeeetty sure what you're asking for is a breach of the magician's code...
I consulted the spirits and they advised against that.  Heavily.
Oh-ho-ho, nice try you cheeky devil~
You're gonna need to be more specific! <phrase moreSpecific>
I'm a magician, not a psychic!
How am I supposed to perform a trick without the tools of the trade?

quote.info: Quote a post (to verify I know it exists)

cleanupSingle.infoo: Remove reactions from a single message.

tcleanup.infoo: Sets the trigger emoji for cleaning up reactions from a post.

all: Whoopsie, that's not supposed to happen!
Huh... well, even the best magicians make mistakes!
Yipes, that didn't turn out the way I hoped!
Uh, don't worry!  I can fix this... I think...

magic.info: Hey everyone, wanna see a magic trick?

all: Please be patient, I'm still getting ready!
I don't have all of my equipment with me at the moment, maybe later?
Sorry, still working out a few kinks in my act!
Erm, now's not a good time.  The rabbits and doves are currently on strike.

music.info: Shares one of my fave songs at random.

all: Okay, let's get this show started!
You wanna know what music I like, eh?
Time to spice things up a bit!
You're right, every good act needs some musical accompaniment!
Here's something that's been stuck in my head lately!
Ooh, this one's right up my alley!
or, as you may know them,
or, the artist formerly known as
who some of you may remember as

say.info: Forces me to say stuff.  Use common sense with this command.

reveal.info: Reveals the name of the last person to use my say command.

delcmd.info: Toggles whether I delete every message with a valid command.

gitpull.info: Forces me to update my local files from the github repo.

regex.info: Check the regex string for a specific category

channel.info: Toggles whether I can post in a given channel.  You must specify a valid channel name (for example, `/minnie channel general`).

channelname.info: Changes the current channel's name.  You must specify a valid channel name (for example, `/minnie channelname abandon-all-hope-ye-who-enter`).

channeldesc.info: Changes the current channel's description.  You must specify a valid string (for example, `/minnie channeldesc Waluigi is underrated, fight me`).

startpoll.info: Begins a reaction poll.  Limit one ongoing poll per channel, be sure to call the other functions first to configure it!

endpoll.info: If a poll is active in the current channel, ends it prematurely and announces the results.

declutterpoll.info: Removes reaction clutter from the current channel's active poll.

abortpoll.info: Ends the poll without announcing the results.

extendpoll.info: Extends the poll with the given amount of time.  Arguments should be given as numbers separated by spaces and correspond to increasing units of time (`minutes` `hours` `days`)

pollquestion.info: Sets the question for the poll.

polloption.info: Adds an option to the poll.

polldeadline.info: Sets a deadline for the poll.  Arguments should be given as numbers separated by spaces and correspond to increasing units of time (`minutes` `hours` `days`)

pollyesclutter.info: Enables 'clutter' reactions on the poll (reactions not corresponding to an option).

pollnoclutter.info: Disables 'clutter' reactions on the poll (reactions not corresponding to an option).

pollyessubmit.info: Allows everyone to submit poll options (limit one per member.)

pollnosubmit.info: Allows everyone to submit poll options (limit one per member.)
